entry.title: 6 Pack 14" Orange Paper Tissue Fluffy Pom Pom Flower Balls
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3300
Type: Decorations
Price: 3.99

[About]

Material: Paper
Dimensions: 14" Diameter
Easy to assemble.
One order is for 6 pom poms
You can hang them, stick them to walls, or even add them on top of your chair sashes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Splaying from all the sides, our gorgeously flared pom poms are absolutely fab! Dangling magically from your ceilings, tree branches, or fixtures, these fluffy pom poms seem to float enchantingly in midair. These paper pom poms are an amazing embellishment to every occasion. From rehearsal dinners to weddings, showers to Halloween and Christmas Parties, or even birthday bashes, these vibrant hanging puffs provide a cheery and whimsical way to add more color and verve to any party venue. Hang them up a ceiling or a tree, bundle them high into corners, place around a candle holder, make into a centerpiece atop a centerpiece holder, or snip away for a paper project-whatever your urges, fancies, and out-of-the-box plans are, use these fanciful pom poms to impart a fluffier, softer, and dreamlike look to them!

Additional Information:

  • Material: Tissue Paper
  • Dimensions: 14" Diameter
  • Easy to assemble.
  • One order is for 6 pom poms
  • You can hang them, stick them to walls, or even add them on top of your chair sashes
  • Uses : Wedding, Event, Birthday, Party, Ceiling Decoration, Hanging Decor

Covered impeccably with tons of shiny reflecting glass mirror pieces, these large disco balls will transform any space into a groovy dance floor by bouncing the playful colors and lurid lights all around. Hang these sprightly mirror ball from your Christmas tree, Window Panes, Curtain Rods, Roof and Ceiling Drapes, or fill in Clear Glass Vases, Jars, and Pots to create glamorous glowing masterpieces. Each 20 inch disco ball is equipped with a 1 inch ring at the top for easy hanging and decoration. 

Additional Information:

  • Tiny Mirrors reflect lights beautifully across the walls and ceiling

entry.title: Pack of 10 - 10 Sq.Ft Gold Peel and Stick Backsplash Rhinestone Studded 3D Metal Wall Tiles
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3400
Type: Decorations
Price: 39.99 - 113.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: Brushed Metal and Colored Rhinestones
1 Qty: 10 Panels
Each Panel Size: 12" x 12"
Total Area Covered: 10 SqFt
Depth: 1/8"
Design: 16 Square Pattern With Triangles and Rhinestones
Each Square: 4 Triangles + 1 Rhinestones
Rhinestones: 16 / Tile
Total Rhinestones: 160
Features: Scratch, Splash, and Heat resistant
Easy to install (Peel and Stick)
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Create a high end, designer look without spending fortunes with our sparkling range of self-adhesive aluminum tiles that are affordable, durable, and undeniably adorable! Made of high quality brushed metal with scratch, splash, and heat resistant qualities, these glimmering tiles are suitable for kitchen backsplash, bathroom backsplash, accent walls, and decorative purposes. Robust metal, won't stain, crack or chip. With an easy peel and stick backing, our Metal Wall Tiles will transform any dull space into a dazzling display with little work and time. These lightweight tile stickers are easy to cut and need no spacers or grout and can easily bend to create perfect corners with minimum cutting and zero wasted offcuts. Embellished with shimmering rhinestones, these glitz tiles will add a touch of elite elegance to your bathrooms, bedrooms, kitchen, fireplace, living room, and even shelves and cabinets.

Additional Information:
  • 1 Qty : 10 Panels
  • Each Panel Size : 12" x 12"
  • Total Area Covered: 10 SqFt
  • Depth: 1/8" 
  • Design of each Tile: 16 Square Pattern with Triangle and Rhinestones
  • Each Square: 4 Triangles & 1 Rhinestone
  • Total Triangle: 64 
  • Total Rhinestones: 16 / Tile
  • Triangle: 2.75" x 2.25" x 1 5/8"
  • Square Diamond: 5/8" x 5/8"
  • Item can be trimmed to the desired length based on the pattern for the area of application.
  • Recommended Use: DIY, Featured Walls, Living & Bed Rooms, Bathroom, Kitchen, etc

PLEASE NOTE: Some wall tiles will be inconsistent when trimmed due to the size of patterns.

Achieve reflective beauty with the simply dazzling square mirrored wall tiles that provide a sleek, stylish, contemporary look to any installation. Small square mirror tiles are seamlessly attached in each panel to give you an attractive alternative to more traditional material for use in kitchen or bathroom backsplash, feature walls or hallway. Mirror tiles work great as both a border or in a full-size sheet creating a sense of greater space through its reflective nature. With scratch, splash, and heat resistant qualities, these bold and beautiful tiles are affordable, durable, and a sensible choice to upgrade your home or office space!

entry.title: 110 Pack DIY Balloon Garland Kit, Balloon Arch Party Decorations - Peach, Gray, Cream, White, Yellow
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3220
Type: Decorations
Price: 11.69

[About]

Quantity: 110 Balloon Garland Kit

12" Balloon Packs: 

  • Peach - 20 Pcs
  • Gray - 10 Pcs
  • Cream - 10 Pcs
  • White - 10 Pcs

5" Balloon Packs:

  • Peach - 20 Pcs
  • Yellow - 20 Pcs
  • Gray - 10 Pcs
  • White  - 10 Pcs

    Balloon Garland Kit:

    • Clear Plastic Chain: 5 Meters
    • Balloon Dots: Roll of 100
    • Balloon Tying Tool: 1 Qty
    • Garland instruction on pack
    Color: Peach | Gray | Cream | White | Yellow
    Shape: Sphere Balloon
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


    [Information]

    No festivity is complete without colorful festive balloons and to give you a huge dose of fun and frolic, our Balloon Kit in celebratory colors is an ideal option. Get any party started with our best quality balloons available in cheerful colors. Compared to the ordinary balloons available in the market, our sturdy balloons are bigger, bolder, and better!
    Fun, festive colors coupled with sleek smooth surface will instantly transform any dull space into an excitingly cheerful realm. Perfect for merry moments like Weddings, Showers, Birthdays, Graduations, Anniversaries, Halloween Party, Christmas Functions, Holiday Events, and any other celebration that calls for an extra dash of color and charisma.
    Create breathtaking Balloon Arches, Balloon Columns, Table Centerpieces, and Balloon Bouquets by clipping the balloons together with our Balloon Buckle Clips, or use in coordination with our Tassels, Pompoms, Foil Letter and Number Balloons and Banners for a fun-filled décor. Get the balloons inflated in no time with our Balloon Hand Pumps or Portable Electric Air Blower Balloon Pump Inflator. Save time, money, and energy on Party Decoration with our exciting range of Party Balloon Kits.

    Additional Information:

    • Float time is about 10 hrs for the 12" balloons. Blow balloons up with helium closer to the time of event for it to last.
    • The 5" balloons will likely not float due to the size of the balloon and the amount of helium it occupies.
    • Uses: Perfect for balloon arch decoration, baby shower, weddings, graduations, anniversaries, corporate events, engagements, BBQs, photo shoots and more!
    • High Quality: These balloons are made of latex material, strong and durable enough to inflate for decoration, safe to use.
    • WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD -- Children under 8 yrs. can choke or suffocate on uninflated or broken balloons. Adult supervision required. Keep uninflated balloons from children. Discard broken balloons at once.

      How To Make Balloon Garland:

      • Inflate all balloons with air and tie a knot using Balloon Tying Tool.
      • Insert balloon lips into decorating strip holes and gently pull balloon knots through the holes to secure. Alternate balloon colors and sizes and skip holes as needed on decorating strip as you attach balloons.
      • Use the dot glue makes it easy to fill the gap of balloons with smaller balloons.
      • Tie a long piece of ribbon to an empty hole at each end of the decorating strip and hang garland against a wall or from the ceiling.

      NOTE:  Total length depends on the setting of balloons. DIY item, total length may vary!

entry.title: 15FT Long Crystal Beaded Ceiling Drape Curtains With Hardware Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Decorations
Price: 69.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Set of Ceiling Drape
Material: Metal, Acrylic

What you get:

  • 15x Strands of Iridescent Beads (preset on 2x Rods)
  • 4x Rods
  • 8x Ceiling Hook Mounts
  • 8x Sets of Steel Brackets
  • 8x Sets of Screws
    		•
    Overall Size: 15ft L x 20" W
    Each Bead Strand Length: 14.8ft
    Bead Size: 1cm (Diameter) x 1mm (Thickness)
    Bead Color: Iridescent
    Each Rod Size: 20"L x 0.5"W
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]


    Additional Information:

    • 2x of the Rods are already installed along with the beads, the other 2x rods are not attached.
    • Item comes with a Bag of Parts needed to hang item. Bag contains the following:

    8x Sets of Steel Brackets:

    1. Each Steel Bracket is pre-installed with 2x Washers, 2x Nuts, 2x Screws, 2x Stoppers.
    2. Steel Brackets are attached to a beam that will help support the item. Each of this set will use 1x Set of Screws so it can be screwed down on to the beam support

    8x Sets of Screws:

    1. Each Set is individually wrapped with 2x Screws, 2x Plastic Anchors
    2. These Screws go into the small oval holes of the Steel Brackets into the supporting beam to mount the item

    Each Rod contains 2x Triangular Hangers on each end to slide the Ceiling Hook Mount through.

    1. Triangular Hanger Size: 0.5"L x 0.5"W
    2. Ceiling Hook Mount Size: 4" Diameter x 0.75" Thick
    3. Ceiling Hook: 1.25"L x 1"W

    Individual Parts Measurement:

    • SET of Steel Bracket:
      • Contains: 2x Large Ovals, 2x Small Ovals, and Center Hole
        • Steel Bracket: 3.5"L x 0.75"W x 1mm (Thickness)
        • Washer Outer/Inner Diameter: 0.5", 0.5cm
        • Nut: 1cm Length x 4mm Inner Diameter
        • Screw: 0.75"L x 1cm W x 0.5cm Neck Diameter
        • Stopper: 0.25" L x 1cm Diameter
    • SET of Screw:
      • Screw: 1"L x 0.25" W x 4mm Neck Diameter
      • Plastic Anchor: 1"L x 1cm W x 0.5cm
      • Each Set is individually wrapped

    How to Install:

    1. You will need to find/create 2x Parallel Support Beams with enough space between each other to assemble this item
    2. Take 1x Set of Steel Bracket and remove the Stoppers. Take 1x Set of Screws.
    3. Take Steel Bracket and place on preferred area on Support Beam with bottom tip of screws facing you. Take a Screw and insert into opening of Plastic Anchor from Screw Set. Proceed to drill into one of the small ovals on the Steel Bracket into the Support Beam. Repeat this step for the remaining Plastic Anchor and Screw.
    4. Take 1x Ceiling Hook Mount and align its 2 holes so that the Screws from the Steel Bracket can go through it. Proceed to take the 2x Stoppers removed from the Steel Bracket and screw on each Screw Tip to secure the Ceiling Hook Mount.
    5. Repeat Steps 2 + 3 assemble another Hook Mount across the one you just setup (ALLOW ENOUGH SPACE for attaching the rods)
    6. Take one of the Preset Rod w/Beads. Each end of the Rod has a Triangular Hole to slide into the Ceiling Hook Mount. Slide each Triangular Hole on the Rod into each Ceiling Hook Mount.
    7. Repeat the Previous Steps to Hook the other Preset Rod w/Beads. At this time, you can choose how far or close you'd like the other end of the Ceiling Drape to be. This creates a wide or narrow Drape Effect based on preference.
    8. OPTIONAL: You can create more Drape Effects of varying size if you choose to use 1x or 2x of the remaining Rods. If you'd like to proceed with this option:

    8-1. Repeat the previous Steps for installing the Ceiling Hook Mounts for however many rods you choose to use. The only thing different is when you are applying the Drape effect with the remaining rods, you are pushing each rod against the beads as you attach it to the Ceiling Hook Mounts. Once the rod is attached, align the bead strands by following the alignment of the Preset Rod.

    8-2. Once the bead strands are aligned, pull each strand of beads in the direction of your preference to help shape the size of the Drape Effect.

Splaying from all the sides, our gorgeously flared pom poms are absolutely fab! Dangling magically from your ceilings, tree branches, or fixtures, these fluffy pom poms seem to float enchantingly in midair. These paper pom poms are an amazing embellishment to every occasion. From rehearsal dinners to weddings, showers to Halloween and Christmas Parties, or even birthday bashes, these vibrant hanging puffs provide a cheery and whimsical way to add more color and verve to any party venue. Hang them up a ceiling or a tree, bundle them high into corners, place around a candle holder, make into a centerpiece atop a centerpiece holder, or snip away for a paper project-whatever your urges, fancies, and out-of-the-box plans are, use these fanciful pom poms to impart a fluffier, softer, and dreamlike look to them!

Additional Information:

  • Material: Tissue Paper
  • Dimensions: 16" Diameter
  • Easy to assemble.
  • One order is for 6 pom poms
  • You can hang them, stick them to walls, or even add them on top of your chair sashes
  • Uses : Wedding, Event, Birthday, Party, Ceiling Decoration, Hanging Decor

entry.title: 110 Pack DIY Balloon Garland Kit, Balloon Arch Party Decorations - Burgundy,Pink,Clear
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3230
Type: Decorations
Price: 13.99

[About]

1 QTY: 110 Balloon Garland Kit

10" Balloon Packs:

  • Metallic Burgundy: 25 Pcs
  • Pink: 25 Pcs
  • Clear with Gold Foil Confetti Balloons: 10 Pcs

5" Balloon Packs:

  • Burgundy: 25 Pcs
  • Pink: 25 Pcs

Balloon Garland Kit:

  • Clear Plastic Chain: 5 Meters
  • Balloon Dots: Roll of 100
  • Balloon Tying Tool: 1 Qty
  • Garland instructions on pack
Color: Burgundy | Pink | Clear
Shape: Sphere Balloon
Need to create static for the confetti balloons to stick to sides
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • For Confetti Balloons: After inflated, please rub gently with wool gloves, sweater, carpet, cloth, hair and roll the balloons to get static so that the confetti stick to the wall the balloon. Pop the balloons will make a great fun when confetti flying out in party.
  • Float time is about 10 hrs for the 10" balloons. Blow balloons up with helium closer to the time of event for it to last.
  • The 5" balloons will likely not float due to the size of the balloon and the amount of helium it occupies.
  • Uses: Perfect for balloon arch decoration, baby shower, weddings, graduations, anniversaries, corporate events, engagements, BBQs, photo shoots and more!
  • High Quality: These balloons are made of latex material, strong and durable enough to inflate for decoration, safe to use.
  • WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD -- Children under 8 yrs. can choke or suffocate on uninflated or broken balloons. Adult supervision required. Keep uninflated balloons from children. Discard broken balloons at once.

How To Make Balloon Garland:

  • Inflate all balloons with air and tie a knot using Balloon Tying Tool.
  • Insert balloon lips into decorating strip holes and gently pull balloon knots through the holes to secure. Alternate balloon colors and sizes and skip holes as needed on decorating strip as you attach balloons.
  • Use the dot glue makes it easy to fill the gap of balloons with smaller balloons.
  • Tie a long piece of ribbon to an empty hole at each end of the decorating strip and hang garland against a wall or from the ceiling.

NOTE: Total length depends on the setting of balloons. DIY item, total length may vary!
